entry.title: Swift 学习资料整理
entry.content:
阅读

  • 苹果 Swift 官网
  • The Swift Programming Language 中文版 - Apple 官方 Swift 教程中文版
  • Swifter - 喵神的项目，每周三更新，向您介绍 Swift 的必备 TIP
  • SwiftCN - Swift 开源技术社区
  • SwiftGuide - 资料合集
  • awesome-swift - 资料合集

Swift 开源项目

  • swift - Swift 本身是开源的
  • Alamofire - Elegant HTTP Networking in Swift
  • SwiftyJSON - The better way to deal with JSON data in Swift
  • Spring - A library to simplify iOS animations in Swift.
  • Perfect - Server-side Swift.
  • 30DaysofSwift - A self-taught project to learn Swift.
  • Design-Patterns-In-Swift - 设计模式实现
  • SnapKit - A Swift Autolayout DSL for iOS & OS X
  • swift-algorithm-club - 算法和数据结构实现合集
  • Kingfisher - A lightweight and pure Swift implemented library for downloading and caching image from the web.
